channel.title: CVE Feed for Typps -- Calendarista Basic Edition

item.title: CVE-2024-31942|2024-08-02T01:59:50.597Z -- typps -- calendarista%20basic%20edition
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Typps Calendarista Basic Edition.This issue affects Calendarista Basic Edition: from n/a through 3.0.2.
